tool_description: EtherBlock is a simple API that connects to Ethereum blockchain
name: EtherBlock
title: EtherBlock

api_list.name: new
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://etherblock.p.rapidapi.com/api/ethereum/wallet/new"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "etherblock.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://etherblock.p.rapidapi.com/api/ethereum/wallet/new"

headers = {

print(response.json())
